cause.description:
BIS.... Brain Injury Society. This is just support for the people who have had to live with TBI or are suffering with it right now. This is a place for those people, their family, and friends to discuss the situations that they have to overcome. We are here to help you with any problems you may be having. My name is Taylor, I am currently dealing with TBI. . I'm here to help anyone who has questions about how to deal with any problems that come up. I will tell them how I delt with it, and what not to do A asdfgn `. This is also for the family and friends and if you have any questions I can answer them as well or you may just want to join to give support. I would like to thank everyone who supports this cause.
1. Their families need the support.
2. and number one rule be patient with the victums, they need people more than ever. dont let them down.
cause.mission: Help the people who have been through this tragedy.
cause.name: TBI survivors
